medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Bilateral subcostal pain started 5 days ago, waxing and waning. Pain became more severe and moved to the epigastrium yesterday, associated with nausea and vomiting. Denied fevers, chills, chest pain, shortness of breath, constipation, diarrhea, recent weight loss, recent illness, sick contacts, recent change in diet or bowel habits.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Skin abscess; previous similar episode 7 months ago with normal labs and RUQ ultrasound.
